summary: Leigh Parrish, a likeable, small-town girl, now famous actress, takes increasingly drastic steps to protect her fame.
cast: Amanda Crew|Kim Coates|Dustin Milligan|Michael Eklund|Katie Boland|Stephen Huszar|Amy Matysio|Kristen Holfeuer|Shannon Jardine|Kristina Hughes|Jody Peters|Brock Andrews|Ann Wu-Lai Parry
title: Ferocious
